abstract: Jeremy Stein, a Federal Reserve governor, says the Fed needs to speak more clearly, but he may have contributed to confusion about the Fed’s intentions.
snippet: Jeremy Stein, a Federal Reserve governor, says the Fed needs to speak more clearly, but he may have contributed to confusion about the Fed’s intentions.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve wasn’t trying to surprise investors last week, it’s just not doing a good job of communicating clearly, Jeremy C. Stein, a Fed governor, said Thursday.

headline.main: The Fed’s Confusing Search for Clarity
